content.description: The European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA) today published its final technical standards (TS) on some of the most important pieces of post-crisis financial regulation: the Markets in Financial Instruments Directive (MiFID II), the Market...
content.title: ESMA releases the final RTS MiFID II, MAR, and CSDR

headline: Senior Analyst Developer (Client Money Calculations & CASS Regulatory Reporting) at Goldman Sachs

values.summary:
Technology Team Lead and Project Manager for Collateral Management & Client Money Protection for Listed Derivatives and Cleared OTC Derivatives at Goldman Sachs. Leading the analysis and implementation of key regulatory changes with a Global technology team spread across different time zones. Working closely with the various Operations groups across GS to ensure firms compliance and adherence to the latest regulator recommendations. 

Key Projects Lead & Delivered

*MiFID II & MiFIR 
*EMIR (European Market Infrastructure Regulation)
* Policy Statement PS 14/9
* Margin Rules
* CASS Audit 2014 - Technology Client Money Controls
values.title: Senior Analyst Developer, Client Assets & Client Money Calculations

summary:
Talented and motivated Technologist with over 10 years of experience in Financial Software development across various different functional areas and finance organisations including investments banks. 

Key current responsibilities include ownership and delivery of complex regulatory requirements using cutting edge technology frameworks and working closely with global technology teams across various regions. 

Also responsible for interaction with external auditors and internal Operations groups to ensure Client Money compliance and regulatory adherence.

Particular experience of regulatory trade processing, including trade and transaction reporting for complex client money calculation and asset segregation across various asset classes at GS.
name: Nirav Shah
